name: Disenchanted FoRRest
description:
How long can you survive the Disenchanted Forest? *Installation/Performance instructions and Download link below*

Feedback greatly appreciated! <3

Controls:

Movement - WASD Jump - Spacebar Attack - Left click

Pickups

Our hero finds himself in a strange forest full of crystals which empower him in one way or another... and ham. 

  • The Red Crystal replenishes your hunger (the red bar)
  • The Blue crystal replenishes your mana (the blue bar) which is spent to attack
  • The Ham replenishes your hunger (the green bar). If this runs out, you will starve and lose health.
  • The White Crystal gives you a temporary (stackable) speed buff.

Enemies

Unfortunately, our hero is being tirelessly pursued by a seemingly endless stream of enemies.

  • Imp - Small and red. Very low health (can be killed with one attack). Casts a spell at you which will disappear after a few seconds if you manage to outrun it. The spell deals damage over time.
  • Demon - Large and grey. More health. Attacks with a melee strike that deals more damage. Less common than the imp, but more deadly. 

Score

Our hero's score will increase:

  • Slowly over time,
  • With each pickup
  • With each enemy killed
Good Luck, Hero.
